text: Perception vs reality - totally different stories.
Funny thinking ancients had it together; bet Pharaohs often faced 'pyramid problems'. Life’s basically just never-ending question marks…in hieroglyphics!
Ancient artifact insurance premiums are no joke either!
Museums often struggle too-heritage roles can be quite rigid!

Graphic design might be good at ditching old stereotypes but let me tell you, museum circles still cling onto 'em pretty hard. Huge surprise when people find out women are rocking Egyptology these days too!
Not just forensics; women curators are shaking things up here too!
Egyptian architecture too - female architects rising!
